SEARCH
Package com.platform.auth.internal

Interface TokenMetadataRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<TokenMetadata,UUID>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<TokenMetadata,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<TokenMetadata,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<TokenMetadata,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<TokenMetadata,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<TokenMetadata>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<TokenMetadata,UUID>
@Repository public interface TokenMetadataRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<TokenMetadata,UUID>
Repository interface for TokenMetadata entity operations.

  • Method Details

    • findByTokenHash

      Optional<TokenMetadata> findByTokenHash(String tokenHash)
      Find token metadata by token hash

    • findFirstByTokenLookupHashAndExpiresAtAfter

      Optional<TokenMetadata> findFirstByTokenLookupHashAndExpiresAtAfter(String tokenLookupHash, Instant now)
      Find token metadata by lookup hash

    • findValidTokens

      @Query("SELECT tm FROM TokenMetadata tm WHERE tm.expiresAt > :now") List<TokenMetadata> findValidTokens(@Param("now") Instant now)
      Find all valid (non-expired) tokens

    • findValidUserTokens

      @Query("SELECT tm FROM TokenMetadata tm WHERE tm.userId = :userId AND tm.expiresAt > :now") List<TokenMetadata> findValidUserTokens(@Param("userId") UUID userId, @Param("now") Instant now)
      Find valid tokens for a specific user

    • countValidUserTokens

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(tm) FROM TokenMetadata tm WHERE tm.userId = :userId AND tm.expiresAt > :now") long countValidUserTokens(@Param("userId") UUID userId, @Param("now") Instant now)
      Count valid tokens for a user

    • findTokensExpiringSoon

      @Query("SELECT tm FROM TokenMetadata tm WHERE tm.expiresAt BETWEEN :now AND :threshold AND tm.expiresAt > :now") List<TokenMetadata> findTokensExpiringSoon(@Param("now") Instant now, @Param("threshold") Instant threshold)
      Find tokens that will expire soon for renewal notifications

    • findStaleTokens

      @Query("SELECT tm FROM TokenMetadata tm WHERE tm.lastUsed < :threshold AND tm.expiresAt > :now") List<TokenMetadata> findStaleTokens(@Param("threshold") Instant threshold, @Param("now") Instant now)
      Find stale tokens (not used for a long time)

    • revokeAllUserTokens

      @Modifying @Query("UPDATE TokenMetadata tm SET tm.expiresAt = :now WHERE tm.userId = :userId AND tm.expiresAt > :now") int revokeAllUserTokens(@Param("userId") UUID userId, @Param("now") Instant now)
      Revoke all tokens for a user by setting expiration to now

    • revokeAllUserTokens

      default int revokeAllUserTokens(UUID userId)
      Revoke all tokens for a user (convenience method)

    • deleteExpiredTokens

      @Modifying @Query("DELETE FROM TokenMetadata tm WHERE tm.expiresAt <= :expiredBefore") int deleteExpiredTokens(@Param("expiredBefore") Instant expiredBefore)
      Delete expired tokens (cleanup)

    • findUserTokensBySessionType

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM token_metadata tm WHERE tm.user_id = :userId AND tm.expires_at > :now AND (tm.metadata::jsonb) ->> \'sessionType\' = :sessionType", nativeQuery=true) List<TokenMetadata> findUserTokensBySessionType(@Param("userId") UUID userId, @Param("sessionType") String sessionType, @Param("now") Instant now)
      Find tokens by user and session type

    • findTokensByIpAddress

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM token_metadata tm WHERE tm.expires_at > :now AND (tm.metadata::jsonb) ->> \'ipAddress\' = :ipAddress", nativeQuery=true) List<TokenMetadata> findTokensByIpAddress(@Param("ipAddress") String ipAddress, @Param("now") Instant now)
      Find tokens by IP address (for security analysis)

    • findByUserIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc

      List<TokenMetadata> findByUserIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc(UUID userId)
      Find all tokens for a user (including expired)

    • deleteByUserId

      @Modifying void deleteByUserId(UUID userId)
      Delete all tokens for a user (GDPR compliance)

    • findTokensCreatedBetween

      @Query("SELECT tm FROM TokenMetadata tm WHERE tm.createdAt BETWEEN :startTime AND :endTime") List<TokenMetadata> findTokensCreatedBetween(@Param("startTime") Instant startTime, @Param("endTime") Instant endTime)
      Find tokens created within a time range

    • countTokensBySessionType

      @Query(value="SELECT (tm.metadata::jsonb) ->> \'sessionType\' AS sessionType, COUNT(*) FROM token_metadata tm WHERE tm.expires_at > :now GROUP BY (tm.metadata::jsonb) ->> \'sessionType\'", nativeQuery=true) List<Object[]> countTokensBySessionType(@Param("now") Instant now)
      Count tokens by session type
